name: Radical Heroes: Crimson City Crisis
description: Radical Heroes is a brand new take on the tried and true beat’em up formula. First we took everything we loved as kid’s growing up in the 80’s and 90's, The video games, action figures, cartoons, arcades and merge all of this awesomeness in to one jam pack experience!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or Later Operating System Processor: 2.ghz+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Later Operating System Processor: 2.8ghz+ Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space
